summary: This is an email from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim to the court and government, transmitting an unredacted version of Ghislaine Maxwell's reply memorandum in support of her pending bail application. It includes the attorney's contact information and a standard confidentiality notice.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: Attorney representing Ghislaine Maxwell, sending a legal filing regarding Maxwell's bail application to the court and government.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referred to as 'Ms. Maxwell', she is the subject of the pending bail application mentioned in the correspondence.

connections.description: Sternheim is acting as Maxwell's defense attorney, filing legal documents on her behalf.

events.title: Filing of Bail Reply Memorandum
events.description: Bobbi C. Sternheim transmits an unredacted reply memorandum in support of Ghislaine Maxwell's pending bail application to the court and government.

locations: 33 West 19th Street - 4th Floor, New York, NY 10011
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell had a pending bail application as of March 16, 2021.
Her defense attorney, Bobbi C. Sternheim, filed a reply memorandum in support of that application.
The document is a cover email transmitting an unredacted legal filing.
The correspondence reflects ongoing legal proceedings in Maxwell's case during the COVID-19 pandemic, with the law office working remotely.
